desc: Your Immune System is like the bouncers at a night club door, controlling those already inside and newcomers. Most of the time they can control the bad actors but can only do so much. IMMUNADE is like a daily serving of extra bouncers.

layout.text: Your Immune System is like the bouncer at a night club door. Most of the time he can control the bad guys but he can only do so much. ImmunAde is a daily serving of extra bouncers.
